      • addService

        public void addService(java.lang.String serviceCode,
                       java.lang.String serviceName,
                       int servicePrice)
        Adds a new service to the directory
        Parameters:
        serviceCode - Six digit code tied to service
        servicePrice - Price of service
        serviceName - Name of service

      • getServiceName

        public java.lang.String getServiceName(java.lang.String serviceCode)
        Returns service name for given service code.
        Parameters:
        serviceCode - Six digit code corresponding to a particular service
        Returns:
        String name of service

      • getServicePrice

        Returns:

      • getServiceCode

        public java.lang.String getServiceCode(java.lang.String serviceName)

      • writeToFile

        public void writeToFile(java.lang.String dir)
                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Writes a formatted text file of all service codes and names to current directory. This is the 'placebo' for Provider Directory being emailed to a provider.
        Parameters:
        dir - Gives the location where to save the file
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - handles FileNotFoundException
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - handles UnsupportedEncodingException
